Hey Guys, just implemented dataenvelop method for Data Envelopment analysis and tested with the dataset given in one of the books in Turkish. The tests are passed. I have to thank to Bahadir Fatih Yildirim, the possible contributor here, for doing editorial jobs in this book! :slightly_smiling_face: <@U01MF8XEZ4M> I will later give references in documentation stage.

I will later give references in documentation stage.

messages.text: Welcome!
hey guys, just implemented the grey() method for Grey Relational Analysis and the method passes the tests given in the reference book of <@U01MF8XEZ4M>

messages.text: the method takes the decision matrix, vector of weights and list of functions as arguments. Differently, user can define [maximum, minimum, minimum, etc...] for optimization directions for each single criterion

messages.text: :innocent:
a new basic method, SAW, has been implemented (short for simple additive weighting). It is relatively a simple method and may have been taken as a reference for further implementations.

messages.text: • a new method, namely ARAS (short for Additive Ratio Assessment) has just been added to the repo.

messages.text:
We have new methods implemented:

ARAS (Additive Ratio Assessment)
WPM (Weighted Product Model)
WASPAS (Weighted Aggregated Sum Product ASsessment)
EDAS (Evaluation based on Distance from Average Solution)
MARCOS (Measurement Alternatives and Ranking according to COmpromise Solution)
